article_title: Denver Broncos team buses depart for Super Bowl Sunday morning
article_text:
As has been their business model, the Broncos are low-keying their send off to Super Bowl XLVIII.

However, if fans want to wish the team well, show up at the rear of the team’s headquarters on Sunday morning. There’s an area along Potomac Street between the outside of the players’ gated parking lot and the Broncos team store.

The staff bus will roll out at 9:30 a.m. Sunday with the player and coaches buses — note the photo is not of their actual buses — exiting about 10 a.m. Sunday. The Broncos will charter out of DIA around 11 a.m. Sunday and land at the Newark airport between 3:30 and 4 p.m. ET.

At that point, the Broncos’s seventh Super Bowl appearance is on.

article_metadata.news_keywords: Denver Broncos,Sports Authority Field at Mile High,Super Bowl,Super Bowl XLVIII

og.description: The team buses for the Denver Broncos depart on Sunday at 9:30 a.m. from team headquarters at Dove Valley. Fans may come to send the team off.

article_summary:
As has been their business model, the Broncos are low-keying their send off to Super Bowl XLVIII.
At that point, the Broncos’s seventh Super Bowl appearance is on.
There’s an area along Potomac Street between the outside of the players’ gated parking lot and the Broncos team store.
However, if fans want to wish the team well, show up at the rear of the team’s headquarters on Sunday morning.
The Broncos will charter out of DIA around 11 a.m. Sunday and land at the Newark airport between 3:30 and 4 p.m.
